short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open one or more Discord channels in a compact popup window with simplified UI and no sidebars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Discord usage with Discord Lite, a lightweight extension that opens Discord channels in compact popup windows with a simplified UI. 

No login required, no data stored - just a cleaner, more focused Discord experience.

Key Features:
• Open Discord channels in distraction-free popup windows
• Simplified UI without sidebars or unnecessary elements
• Seamless integration with your existing Discord account - no additional login needed
• Zero data storage - your privacy is respected

Perfect for:
1. Multitasking professionals who need quick access to Discord
2. Students wanting to check messages without losing focus on their work
3. Anyone looking to declutter their Discord experience
4. Users with limited screen space or multiple monitors

How it works:
1. Navigate to any Discord channel in your browser
2. Click the Discord Lite icon in your extensions bar
3. Select "Create Discord Popup"
4. Instantly access a streamlined version of your Discord channel

Benefits:
• Improved focus and productivity
• Reduced screen clutter
• Quick access to Discord conversations
• Enhanced privacy - no additional data collection or storage

Compatible with all Discord channels and works instantly with your existing Discord session. 

Experience a lighter, faster, and more focused way to use Discord without compromising on functionality or privacy.
